You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm.
 On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level."
 Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
role.fightingStyle: Two-Weapon Fighting: When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.

background.tools:
This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks,
 a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. 
 Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.
